c74object.name: maxscore.sampler
c74object.digest: Play back MaxScore Editor note events in cent precision.
c74object.description:
maxscore.sampler
is a Max abstration capable of loading and editing bank files as well as playing back samples in cent precision. It is designed to work with the output of the MaxScore Editor, but also works as an independent abstraction reacting to note, pitchbend, volume and panorama messages.

objarg.name: measureWidth
objarg.description: With measureWidth set to 0 (default), the setMeasureWidth message will be suppressed.

objarg.name: countMeasuresFromZero
objarg.description: With @countMeasuresFromZero set to 0 (default), parsed measure indexes correspond to the current measure numbers, with the the value to 1, the parsed measure indexes always start with 0.

method.name: symbol
method.description:
parses
com.algomusic.max.MaxScore
XML data generated in response to info queries into Max messages

method.name: enddump
method.description:
MaxScore's XML dumps are framed by the startdump and
enddump
messages. They are being used by
maxscore.parse
to reset the abstraction and trigger the parser.

entry.name: message
entry.description: Out left outlet: Grace note attributes

entry.name: message
entry.description: Out second outlet: Grace note index

entry.name: message
entry.description: Out right outlet: Additional attributes that don't translate into MaxScore messages
